subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Comments by the former touring professional Justin Gimelstob on a radio show have cost him again. Television commercials featuring Gimelstob promoting the United States Open Series are being scrapped by the United States Tennis Association because of his derogatory and sexually suggestive remarks about Anna Kournikova and other women last month. Previously, Gimelstob was suspended for one match without pay by World Team Tennis, and the Tennis Channel, for which he also works, requested that he make a “substantial” donation to the Women’s Sports Foundation.
